segments.text: I see the woman facing away from the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's carefully wiping that plate, so intent.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sink behind her is flooding the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water pours down, soaking everything in sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the puddle; she might slip any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are raiding the cookie jar without her knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool looks so vulnerable up there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and he'll tumble down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands ready, innocent in her excitement.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This obliviousness makes me feel sorry for them all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The tidy garden outside seems worlds away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would intervene before harm comes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's heartbreaking to watch potential tragedy unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The domestic peace is so fragile here.
segments.speaker: PAR
